channel.title: Starship Flight 10 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: SpaceX’s lesson from last Starship flight? “We need to seal the tiles.”
item.description: SpaceX is targeting an orbital Starship flight with a next-gen vehicle next year.

item.title: Under pressure after setbacks, SpaceX’s huge rocket finally goes the distance
item.description: This was the first successful flight of SpaceX’s second-generation Starship after three failures.
